title: 2 Days / 1 Night Flying Safari from Zanzibar to Selous Game Reserve
shortDescription: Fly from Zanzibar into the vast Selous (Nyerere) wilderness for a full-day game drive, overnight in a lodge or camp, and a tranquil boat safari before returning to the islands.

days.title: Day 1 – Zanzibar to Selous, full-day game drive
days.description: You will be collected early from your hotel in Zanzibar and driven to the airport for the morning flight to Selous Game Reserve (now Nyerere National Park). On arrival at the airstrip you meet your safari guide and set out on a full-day game drive, with a picnic lunch in the bush. The reserve is home to elephant, buffalo, giraffe, zebra, lion, leopard, hyena, wild dog and more, all spread across a huge, lightly visited landscape. In the late afternoon you return to your lodge or tented camp inside or close to the reserve for dinner and overnight.

days.title: Day 2 – Boat safari and return to Zanzibar
days.description: After breakfast you head out on a relaxed boat safari, following the river channels and lagoons that draw in hippos, crocodiles and birdlife. A picnic lunch is included. Later in the afternoon you drive back to the airstrip for your return flight to Zanzibar. On arrival you are met and driven back to your hotel on the islands, usually arriving in time for a quiet evening.

title: 1 Day Flying Safari from Zanzibar to Mikumi National Park
shortDescription: Fly from Zanzibar to Mikumi for a full-day game drive in classic Tanzanian savannah before returning to the islands by evening.

days.title: Day 1 – Zanzibar to Mikumi and back
days.description: You will be collected from your hotel in Zanzibar at around 05:00 and driven to the airport for the 07:00 flight to Mikumi National Park. On arrival you are met at the airstrip by your safari guide and set out on a full-day game drive through classic East African savannah. Mikumi is Tanzania's fourth largest national park and is home to elephant, zebra, impala, wildebeest, buffalo, giraffe, lion and more, with acacia, baobab and open plains creating wide views. A simple lunch is taken inside the park so that you can stay close to the wildlife and light. In the afternoon you continue your game drive until around 16:00, when you return to the airstrip for your flight back to Zanzibar. On arrival, usually around 17:00, you are met and driven back to your hotel on the islands.

title: 1 Day Flying Safari from Zanzibar to Selous Game Reserve
shortDescription: Fly from Zanzibar into the vast Selous wilderness for a full-day game drive before returning to the coast by evening.

days.title: Day 1 – Full-day safari in Selous and return to Zanzibar
days.description:
You will be collected from your hotel in Zanzibar at around 05:00 and driven to the airport for the morning flight to Selous Game Reserve (part of the wider Nyerere ecosystem). After landing at the airstrip, usually around 08:00, you meet your guide and begin a full-day game drive through one of Africa's largest protected wilderness areas. Selous is home to elephant, lion, leopard, buffalo, Masai giraffe, plains zebra, hippo, crocodile, wild dog and many other species, set against a backdrop of rivers, woodland and open plains. A picnic or bush lunch is served in a scenic spot so you can stay close to the wildlife and light.

In the afternoon you continue exploring different areas of the reserve until it is time to return to the airstrip for your scheduled flight back to Zanzibar, typically departing around 16:00. On arrival at Zanzibar Airport, usually around 17:00, you are met and transferred back to your hotel for a quiet evening by the sea.

title: 2 Days – Mikumi National Park Flying Safari
shortDescription: A calm two-day escape from Zanzibar to Mikumi National Park, with a full day on safari and a visit to a Maasai community before flying back.

days.title: Day 1 – Zanzibar to Mikumi, full-day game drive
days.description: You will be collected from your hotel in Zanzibar and driven to the airport for the morning flight to Mikumi National Park. On arrival at the airstrip you meet your safari guide and set out on a full-day game drive through classic East African savannah. Mikumi is home to elephant, zebra, impala, wildebeest, buffalo, giraffe, lion and more, with acacia, baobab and open plains creating wide views across the park. A picnic or bush lunch is served in a scenic spot so you can stay close to the wildlife and light. In the late afternoon you return to your camp or lodge for dinner and overnight.

days.title: Day 2 – Maasai community visit and return to Zanzibar
days.description: After breakfast you take a short visit to a nearby Maasai community, where you can learn about local traditions and daily life. This is a respectful, low-key visit that supports the community. You then return to the park for a relaxed game drive with a packed lunch, exploring different areas and following wildlife as it moves across the savannah. In the afternoon you drive back to the airstrip for your return flight to Zanzibar. On arrival you are met and transferred back to your hotel on the islands.

title: 2 Days – Lake Manyara & Tarangire from Zanzibar
shortDescription: Two contrasting northern parks in one short trip: flamingos and forested escarpments at Lake Manyara, then elephants and baobabs in Tarangire.

days.title: Day 1 – Zanzibar to Lake Manyara
days.description: You will be collected from your hotel in Zanzibar and driven to the airport for the morning flight to Arusha. On arrival you meet your safari guide and drive to Lake Manyara National Park, a compact park known for its tree-climbing lions, large elephant herds, and the alkaline lake that draws flamingos and other waterbirds. You enjoy a relaxed game drive with a picnic lunch, exploring the forested escarpment and open plains. In the evening you check into a comfortable lodge near the park for dinner and overnight.

days.title: Day 2 – Tarangire and return to Zanzibar
days.description: After breakfast you drive to Tarangire National Park, famous for its large elephant herds and ancient baobab trees. The park's river valleys and open savannah support a rich diversity of wildlife, including zebra, wildebeest, buffalo, giraffe, and predators such as lion and leopard. You spend the morning and early afternoon on game drives with a packed lunch, following wildlife as it moves through the park. Later in the afternoon you drive back to Arusha Airport for your return flight to Zanzibar. On arrival you are met and transferred back to your hotel.

title: 2 Days – Tarangire & Ngorongoro Crater
shortDescription: A focused two-day safari that pairs Tarangire's elephant country with a full game drive on the Ngorongoro Crater floor.

days.title: Day 1 – Zanzibar to Tarangire
days.description: You will be collected from your hotel in Zanzibar and driven to the airport for the morning flight to Arusha. On arrival you meet your safari guide and drive to Tarangire National Park, famous for its large elephant herds and ancient baobab trees. The park's river valleys and open savannah support a rich diversity of wildlife. You spend the day on game drives with a picnic lunch, following wildlife as it moves through the park. In the evening you check into a lodge near the Ngorongoro highlands for dinner and overnight.

days.title: Day 2 – Ngorongoro Crater and return to Zanzibar
days.description: After an early breakfast you drive into the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and descend into the crater floor for a full game drive. The crater is a natural amphitheatre that supports a dense concentration of wildlife, including elephant, buffalo, zebra, wildebeest, hippo, and predators such as lion, leopard, and hyena. The crater floor also offers excellent chances to see the rare black rhino. You enjoy a picnic lunch on the crater floor before beginning the ascent back to the rim. Later in the afternoon you drive back to Arusha Airport for your return flight to Zanzibar. On arrival you are met and transferred back to your hotel.

title: 3 Days – Ngorongoro, Tarangire & Lake Manyara
shortDescription: Three classic northern parks in one itinerary, linking Tarangire's baobabs, Ngorongoro's crater floor and the lakeshore of Manyara.

On arrival you meet your safari guide and drive straight to Tarangire National Park for a full-day game drive. Tarangire is famous for its large elephant herds and ancient baobab trees, with river valleys and open savannah supporting a rich diversity of wildlife. You enjoy game drives with a picnic lunch, following wildlife as it moves through the park. In the evening you check into a lodge in the highlands for dinner and overnight.

days.title: Day 2 – Ngorongoro Crater

The crater is a natural amphitheatre that supports a dense concentration of wildlife, including elephant, buffalo, zebra, wildebeest, hippo, and predators such as lion, leopard, and hyena. You return to the same lodge for your second night.

days.description: After breakfast you drive to Lake Manyara National Park, a compact park known for its tree-climbing lions, large elephant herds, and the alkaline lake that draws flamingos and other waterbirds. title: 3 Days – Serengeti Flying Safari from Zanzibar
shortDescription: A three-day flying safari from Zanzibar into the Serengeti, with long game drives on the plains and two nights in a tented camp.

days.title: Day 1 – Zanzibar to Serengeti
days.description: You will be collected from your hotel in Zanzibar and driven to the airport for the morning flight direct to the Serengeti. On arrival at the airstrip you meet your safari guide and set out on a game drive to your tented camp, with wildlife viewing along the way. The Serengeti is one of Africa's most iconic wilderness areas, home to vast herds of wildebeest, zebra, and gazelle, along with predators such as lion, leopard, cheetah, and hyena. You arrive at camp in time for lunch, then head out again in the afternoon for game drives on the plains. You return to camp for dinner and overnight.

days.title: Day 2 – Full-day game drive in the Serengeti
days.description: After breakfast you set out on a full-day game drive with a picnic lunch, following wildlife across the savannah. The Serengeti's open plains offer excellent game viewing, and you may see large herds of herbivores, predators on the hunt, and the dramatic landscapes that make this park so famous. Your guide will take you to different areas of the park depending on where wildlife is most active. You return to camp in the late afternoon for a relaxed evening, dinner and overnight.

days.title: Day 3 – Morning game drive and return to Zanzibar
days.description: After breakfast you have the option of a morning game drive or a relaxed start at camp, depending on your preference. You then transfer to the airstrip for your return flight to Zanzibar. On arrival you are met and transferred back to your hotel on the islands.
